name: Let Me Drink My Coffee!
description:
You control a coffee, which you have to deliver to yourself! 

You have to collect different ingredients to make the coffee as tasty as possible for you. But careful, since in the way other people will chase you because they are hungry for some coffee! You can also sacrifice some of your coffee to distract others for some time, and use some sugar to give a temporal speed boost.

There is a red arrow which always points towards the goal, you.

Credits

All programming was made by me.

Part of the art was made by me, the other artists have been credited in the game.

All sounds are from freesound.org.

Ingredients

The amount of each ingredients you have is shown in 3 bars: 

1. Coffee

2. Sugar

3. and Milk

Each bar has a red line. The closer you get your ingredients to that line, the higher your score will be when you reach the goal.

Boosts

You can use some of your coffee to distract others, by aiming with the mouse and clicking.

You can also use some of your sugar by pressing E to give you some speed boost.

The other people who chase you only see you within a range and will stop chasing you once you hide behind anything like walls or furniture.
